title: Revert logout button color change (roll back to Version 34)

requirements.text: Revert the logout button styling in the Header component and LoginButton component back to how it appeared in Version 34, undoing the dark color change that was applied in Version 35.
acceptanceCriteria: The logout button in the desktop header navigation displays the same color/style as it did before the Version 35 dark color change.
The logout button in the mobile navigation displays the same color/style as it did before the Version 35 dark color change.
The LoginButton component no longer has the darker color styling introduced in Version 35.
No other UI elements are affected by this revert.

constraints: Only revert the logout button color/styling changes introduced in Version 35. Do not change any other UI elements.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths (hooks, main.tsx, ui components).
nonGoals: Modifying any other component styles beyond the logout button.
Introducing new features or design changes.
